svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Healthy life expectancy vs. Health expenditure per capita, 2014
Healthy life expectancy, defined as the average number of years lived free from disability or disease burden, versus
average per capita health expenditure measured in 2011 international-$.
Health expenditure per capita, PPP (constant 2011 international $)
